mapper.select:
select u.id u_id, u.realname name, u.telephone mobile, substring_index(o.name,'-',1) department,
CASE WHEN o.name like '%-%' THEN substring_index(o.name, '-', -1) ELSE '' END project,
CASE WHEN o1.name like '%_%' THEN substring_index(o1.name, '_', -1) ELSE o1.name END company,
ao.am_time, ao.pm_time, ao.sequence+ao.companySeq sequence
from admin_user u left join admin_organization o on o.id=u.organization_id left join admin_organization o1 on o1.id=o.parent left join admin_user_otherinfo ao on u.telephone = ao.mobile where o1.name is not null and o1.name like '%绿地集团%' and u.telephone = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by sequence limit 1

select u.id u_id, u.realname name, u.telephone mobile, substring_index(o.name,'-',1) department,
CASE WHEN o.name like '%-%' THEN substring_index(o.name, '-', -1) ELSE '' END project,
CASE WHEN o1.name like '%_%' THEN substring_index(o1.name, '_', -1) ELSE o1.name END company,
ao.am_time, ao.pm_time, ao.sequence+ao.companySeq sequence
from admin_user u left join admin_organization o on o.id=u.organization_id left join admin_organization o1 on o1.id=o.parent left join admin_user_otherinfo ao on u.telephone = ao.mobile where o1.name is not null and o1.name like '%绿地集团%' and u.telephone not in ( '17755572287','13952078610','17366001910', '17312276662','13851781324','17366010645', '13813959088','18994018881','18538469566' )

select u.id u_id, u.realname name, u.telephone mobile, substring_index(o.name,'-',1) department,
CASE WHEN o.name like '%-%' THEN substring_index(o.name, '-', -1) ELSE '' END project,
CASE WHEN o1.name like '%_%' THEN substring_index(o1.name, '_', -1) ELSE o1.name END company,
ao.am_time, ao.pm_time, ao.sequence+ao.companySeq sequence
from admin_user u left join admin_organization o on o.id=u.organization_id left join admin_organization o1 on o1.id=o.parent left join admin_user_otherinfo ao on u.telephone = ao.mobile where o1.name is not null and o1.name like '%绿地集团%' and u.telephone not in ( '17755572287','13952078610','17366001910', '17312276662','13851781324','17366010645', '13813959088','18994018881','18538469566' ) and u.telephone not in ( #{mobiles,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.insert:
insert into admin_user_otherinfo
u_id,
name,
mobile,
am_time,
pm_time,
sequence,
company,
department,
project,
#{uId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{amTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pmTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{sequence,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{project,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
